summary: Tamriel time is different then ours. I listed the months, Jan-Dec, and the days of the week Mon-Fri and weekends too Sat and Sun.
descriptionHtml:
Tamriel time is different then ours. I listed the months, Jan-Dec, and the days of the week Mon-Sun. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/764?]here[/url]. And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/30435]Oblivion Our Days And Months[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
